review.title: “it is among the best high school in the locality.”
review.pros: Pros – the workplace or the school as a whole has a kind of democratic atmosphere; the classes assigned are easy to handle since they belong to star sections; the co-workers and immediate superior are easy to work with.
review.cons: Cons – in any workplace, the kind of administrator (or principal ) matters most. in previous years, the workplace has been very satisfactory, but lately, its getting unsatisfactory.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – decisions must be made with thorough understanding..
